duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide architectural solutions for Enterprise, Wholesale, Business Market, and Wireless B2B stacks using the NorthStar architecture framework.
Work with senior architects to define high-level design artifacts and facilitate collaboration sessions.
Research the existing application footprint and recommend solutions to run application workloads with futuristic architecture.
Ensure consistency and alignment across Enterprise from both a technical and process alignment perspective.
Communicate at the right level of detail and with a clear message when interacting with any stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
Experience in Telecom Industry Enterprise Architecture
